note:
I am an educator, father, historian, philosopher, daf yomi enthusiast, cool bike guy, war skeptic, role-playing game nerd, Baltimorean, carnivorous plant cultivator, incarceration hater, and getting more punk as I get older. Trying to find ways to get a little liberation into my local systems of oppression. He/him/his for now.

If you think you know me from FB or IG, message me and I'll confirm (but I use my real name there and want at least a little distance here).
